subject: Hi
body:
Hi
I am a Canadian female geologist dealing in crude oil and precious stones business in the Middle East. I have an urgent welfare mission project that will require your personal involvement if you oblige.
We shall discuss details upon your response.
Dr.Thana Burhan
(Manama Bahrain)
Reply to Email:   
burhanthana099@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Hi
body:
Hello Burhan,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested to hear more about your welfare mission project. Could you please provide me with some details? What exactly is the project about and how can I be of help?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Wendy

subject: Re: Hi
body:
Thanks for your candid response.  It is important that I explain the
details of  the proposed charity project so that you will understand
 exactly what to do and how I need your  involvement in the program as
administrator. It is a 100% legal and legitimate  welfare program to help
especially  the suffering orphans,  less privileged widows  and abandoned
elderly people in the society.

 I feel eternally indebted to society  because I was raised in an orphanage
 in Toronto and went through school by scholarship under (NSERC)Natural
Sciences & Engineering Research Council Canada.  This brief introduction is
necessary so that you would know my humble background and appreciate the
reason for my  decision to reach out for this charity mission at this time
of my life, with my personal wealth made from the crude oil and precious
stones business.

I was married for many years to a wealthy businessman  and  later got
divorced from the fruitless and abusive marriage.I have no child of my own
and no immediate or traceable blood relatives as family. Just about  when I
decided   to go for an adoption, I became  very sick and was later
diagnosed with a  terminal disease which is why I am at a medical facility
here in Manama Bahrain for treatment. My resolve to embark on this
humanitarian program at this very critical time of my life is because it is
the only achievement that will  bring satisfaction to my soul. It would be
foolish of me to leave behind my hard earned wealth to the so-called
friends  who betrayed and actually abandoned me now that I need them most.
I wish to know more about your good self in detail, with your picture or
identity attached. I will provide you with more  information  on receipt of
your positive response.

Dr.Thana Burhan
Bldg 178, Flat 104, Road 907, 309
P.O. Box 10988
Manama Bahrain
Tel/WhatsApp : +97337079207

subject: Re: Hi
body:
Hello Burhan,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing your story. I'm sorry to hear about the challenges you've faced in your life, but it's admirable that you want to help those in need through a charity project.

Could you please provide more information about the specific details of this charity project? I would like to understand how it works and how my involvement would make a difference. Additionally, could you explain how the funds will be used to support orphans, widows, and elderly people?

While I appreciate your request for personal information, I prefer to keep my identity private for now. However, I am genuinely interested in learning more about this opportunity and how I can contribute positively.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wendy
